channel.title: Farhads Platz
channel.description: I have made this personal website to bring what I have in mind to keyboard. I don't know in which direction in will go, and for now, the aim is not of my concern. My writings can involve philosopy, politics, science, and technology.

item.title: What old pictures have to say?
item.description: I write about what pictures can hold within them, and how effective they can be if employed by propoganda machinery.

item.title: Make your voice heard!
item.description: I explore how I can make my voice better heard through protesting in berlin, i.e how I can be more effective with my voice.

item.title: Boredom activity: gravity defying flowers
item.description: I had a day filled with boredom and joy, so I write about an art piece I tried to create.

item.title: Why am I here?
item.description: I elaborate on why I setup this website and what I am going to be writing about in the upcoming posts.
